message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $120. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I understand that $90 is a bit tight for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $100. Let me know if that's more to your liking!
